dialog.name: You
dialog.message: So this is the place, huh?
Hello there! Are you looking for a quest?

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: No. I am not an adventurer.
Oh. So are you applying for an adventurer's license?

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: No. I was actually sent here by someone.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: (If you could call "that", a someone.)
Someone? Who you might be talking about?

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: The Creator.
The Creator, huh.
Why would The Creator send someone here? Are you messing with me?

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: Look. I am not messing with you. He speaked to me in my dreams.
Dreams, huh.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: If you don't believe me, then-
Then, what? You're going to tell The Creator that I did not believe you?

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: (I knew I shouldn't have believed that dream. What was I thinking.)

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: I-I-I'll just leave.
Wait!
Are you the one?
Are you the one sent by The Creator?

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: Yeah. I think so.
Ryor. Lead him upstairs. I'll go get my things.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: O-okay.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: Come with me.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: (So, is this dream real? I guess I'll have to find out myself.)
Did The Creator tell you about the invasion?

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: Only that the goblin population are on the rise. And that they're invading nearby villages.
Well. That's most of it.
If it were normal goblins, we would have no problems dealing with them.
One person here would gladly slay all of them.
But the golbins are now using spells. And the only way to defeat them is to counter these spells.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: I understand that these goblins must be stopped.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: But why me? I don't even know how spells work!
That I don't know.
But The Creator chose you. So there must be something within you.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: That's good and all. But I really don't know how spells work.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: Do not worry about that. I, Gema, will ensure that The Creator's will be done.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: In fact, we can start now. Meet Ryor at the training field once you're ready to start.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: One more thing. I know he told me something more than this invasion but I can't seem to remember it.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: That's one of the reason that I went to this place that he told me in my dream.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: I'll be happy to help you remember it. But we'll have to handle this goblin invasion first.

dialog.name: Gema
dialog.message: Take this Journal with you. It will be helpful in you journey.
